title: When I try to update the PBE I get errors, been happening for close to a month or 2.
body:
My exact problem is that when I try to update the PBE it just sits there at 0% until an error message "Patching failed and we're not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again.(Error code 004)" pops up. I restart the client and the same thing happens. 

I really need a fix for this, I gotta play new Galio tomorrow man. Im level 4 on live Galio :(

replies.body: Is testing already around the corner?  I'd like to help!  It sounds like you might have a security or OS setting blocking the patcher from prepping game files and applying updates.  Our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help fix that up!  Let me know if you have any questions on this.
